ErrorMiddleware vs ErrorController

Dinoloop has support for multiple ErrorMiddleware but only a single ErrorController. This guide explains why.

Why Multiple ErrorMiddlewares?

Expressjs has robust error handling using error middlewares. Dinoloop wants this great feature in its core. This comes with one problem. How do you figure out if this middleware handles logic for the global error handler? You either have to walkthrough all the middlewares logic or have consistent filenames.

The ErrorController solves this problem.

Why Single ErrorController?

So others know exactly where to put application error logic. 


    

    
    
        
  • ErrorController is the last error handler in Dinoloop. Once the error goes out of its scope, it reaches Expressjs.
            Now Expressjs can decide to crash the container or handle it.
